    • getUserById

      @RolesAllowed({"ADMIN","OWNER","CUSTOMER"}) @GetMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GetUserByIdResponse> getUserById(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Parameters:
      id - user id
      Returns:
      user
      Should:
      return 401 if user is unauthorized, return 200 if user is authorized

    • getAllOwners

      @RolesAllowed("ADMIN") @GetMapping("/owners") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<GetAllOwnersResponse>> getAllOwners()
      Returns:
      list of owner
      Should:
      return 401 when user is not logged-in, return 403 when user is not admin, return 200 when user is admin

      Parameters:
      request - update user request
      Returns:
      http response with no content status
      Should:
